## Government Tender Announcement
### Solicitation Title
Advanced Sinker Electrical Discharge Machine
### Solicitation Number
WS4365746233

### Notice Summary

The Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base Trenton, requires the provision of one (1) Advanced Sinker Electrical Discharge Machine. The additional purchase option for a second machine is also available. This procurement is intended to meet the operational requirements of the Department of National Defence.

### Closing Date and Time
The bid submission deadline is 14:00 EST on 2024-01-16.

### Contract Details

* The contract start date is expected to be January 15, 2024
* The expected contract end date is January 15, 2027
* Delivery of the initial Advanced Sinker Electrical Discharge Machine is required on or before March 29, 2023 (this date has passed; the drop-dead date for a successful bid is January 16th, 2024 at 14:00 EST)

### Notice Type and Procurement Method
This is a competitive tender with an open bidding process. The evaluation criteria are based on the "Lowest Price" principle.

### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to bidders from the following countries:
Canada, Chile, Korea, Honduras, Peru, UK, Ukraine, Panama, European Union, Colombia, and by virtue of CPTPP, Australia, Brunei, Canada, Chile, China, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Peru, Singapore, Vietnam.

### Regions of Opportunity
This procurement is open to companies located across Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

### Delivery Regions
The deliveries will occur in Ontario, except in the National Capital Region.

### Point of Contact

Andrew Denbeigh
TPSGC/PWGSC
andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18346488?extsite=MTgzNDY0ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Submission Requirements
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on or before January 16, 2024, at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will not be accepted.

### Notice History
This is amendment 3 to the original solicitation notice. The amendment clarifies the bid submission deadline.  The notice was originally published on December 21, 2023 and amended on January 11
